sentences.english: Simplicity and straightforwardness are sometimes totally necessary.
sentences.chinese: 簡單和直接了當，有時是完全必要的。

sentences.english: It may be our most direct throwback to the earliest community.
sentences.chinese: 使用導盲犬也許是人類最爲直接了當的返祖現象。

sentences.english: The first is the most straightforward: optimize your code.
sentences.chinese: 第一個是最直接了當的，優化代碼。

sentences.english: Our lightest shell takes a straightforward approach to alpinism .
sentences.chinese: 我們最輕的夾克採取直接了當的登山方式。

sentences.english: But things are not always that straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 但是事情並不總是那麼直接了當。

sentences.english: The adoption of new disciplines and practices is, in a sense, straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 在某種意義上，新規程和實踐的採用是直接了當的。

sentences.english: See if you can identify the most direct solution to some of your problems.
sentences.chinese: 你能夠用最直接了當的方法解決自己的問題嗎？
